title: 93. Love, Dating, and Accountability
description:
Hey sis!

In this episode we're talking alllll about dating, and taking accountability for our dating patterns. Get into this tea & this healing! Enjoy!

To snag your free mini-coaching video on what to do when you CAN'T stop thinking about them go to beatricekamau.com/healingfromhurt

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
